I often find myself feeling down and sometimes my thoughts seem scattered, causing me to feel caught between the complexities of life. During those moments, listening to BTS, especially your songs, serves as a remedy that alleviates some of the heaviness I experience at night.  I want to express my gratitude and hope that you will continue to create songs that resonate with people like me. Although it may seem self-centered to say so, your music has a profound impact on my life, providing solace and comfort during difficult times.  Thank you for your artistry, and I genuinely hope that you will always continue to produce the beautiful songs that you consistently create.

the space level
as namjoon said in the commentary, the song is almost raw. it speaks of fantasy-like desires and the "space level" which is felt from the atmosphere of the song, and yet somehow there's still an earthy taste (?) to it. maybe even slightly metallic? which i believe explains the rawness of it. and then there's also how naturally the collaboration came to life, that also adds to the raw quality of the song. that rawness is what makes things everlasting, far from ephemeral, transcending time (and space)! which is why i do not believe this song will ever lose its magic.
